sen.j: 山縣・ロバノフ協定（やまがた・ろばのふきょうてい、）とは、1896年6月9日に大日本帝国とロシア帝国の間で結ばれた、朝鮮についての紛争に関する協定のこと。
sen.e: The Yamagata-Lobanov Agreement was the agreement signed on 9 June 1896 between the Empire of Japan and the Empire of Russia on disputes over their sphere of influence over Korea.
The Yamagata-Lobanov Agreement was the agreement signed on June 9, 1896 between the empires of Japan and Russia on disputes over their sphere of influence over Korea.
sen.cmt: June 9, 1896が9 June 1896になってました。
sen.e: The Yamagata-Lobanov Agreement was the agreement signed on June 9, 1896 between the empires of Japan and Russia on disputes over their sphere of influence over Korea.

sen.j: 李氏朝鮮の宮廷内の親日派と親露派の権力闘争による不安定な政治情勢は、日露双方の利益を危険にさらしていた。
sen.e: The unstable political situation in Korea due to the competition for the power between the pro-Japanese and pro-Russian factions in the Joseon dynasty was endangering the interests of both Japan and Russia side.

The unstable political situation in Korea due to the power struggle between the pro-Japanese and Russian factions in the Joseon dynasty was endangering the interests of both Japanese and Russian sides.
sen.cmt: 文章を少し短縮し、Japan and Russia sideをJapanese and Russian sidesに編集しました。
sen.e: The unstable political situation in Korea due to the power struggle between the pro-Japanese and Russian factions in the Joseon dynasty was endangering the interests of both Japanese and Russian sides.

sen.j: 協定はサンクトペテルブルクにおいて、山縣有朋元首相（当時）と、ロシア帝国の外務大臣アレクセイ・ロバノフ＝ロストフスキー公の間で交わされた。
sen.e: The agreement was signed in Saint Petersburg by the ex-prime minister of Japan, Aritomo YAMAGATA, and the Russian foreign minister, Prince Alexei Lobanov-Rostovsky.
The agreement was signed in Saint Petersburg by the ex-prime minister of Japan, Aritomo YAMAGATA, and the Russian foreign minister, Prince Alexey Lobanov-Rostovsky.
sen.cmt: アレクセイ・ロバノフ＝ロストフスキー公はAlexeiではなく、AlekseyかAlexeyとスペルします。
sen.e: The agreement was signed in Saint Petersburg by the ex-prime minister of Japan, Aritomo YAMAGATA, and the Russian foreign minister, Prince Alexey Lobanov-Rostovsky.

sen.j: 協定では朝鮮の独立を保証すること、朝鮮の財政改革を促進すること、近代的警察及び軍隊を組織すること、電信線を維持することについて、共通の意思を明示した。
sen.e: In the agreement, it was stated that both Japan and Russian would guarantee the independence of Korean, promote fiscal reform in Korea, assemble a modern police and army, and maintain telegraph lines.
It was the neutral agreement that both Japan and Russian would guarantee the independence of Korean, promote fiscal reform in Korea, assemble a modern police and army, and maintain telegraph lines.
sen.cmt: 「共通の意思を明示した」の翻訳が無かったので編集しました。
sen.e: It was the neutral agreement that both Japan and Russian would guarantee the independence of Korean, promote fiscal reform in Korea, assemble a modern police and army, and maintain telegraph lines.

sen.j: この協定は、1898年の西・ローゼン協定によって替えられた。
sen.e: The Yamagata-Lobanov Agreement was superseded by the Nishi-Rosen Agreement of 1898.
The Yamagata-Lobanov Agreement was superseded by the Nishi-Rosen Agreement of 1898.
